articles.author: Richard Leadbetter, Will Judd
articles.title: AMD 4800S Desktop Kit review: playing PC games on the Xbox Series X CPU - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: What if you transplant the CPU from the Xbox Series X into a Windows gaming PC? AMD’s 4800S Desktop Kit allows just that - and we've tested it extensively!
articles.content: What if you could take the Zen 2 CPU cores found within Xbox Series X and PlayStation 5, transplant them onto a PC motherboard, install Windows and actually play PC games on them? Short of hacking th… [+7107 chars]
